name: Duck Life Retro Pack
description:
Play the 3 classic Duck Life games like you've never seen them before!


DUCK LIFE: ORIGIN
Where it all started - train your duckling to become the champion of racing ducks and save your farm. Train it up in running, swimming and flying then enter it in races to win hats and different colours! As you play the training mini games, the duck levels up, making it faster during the races

DUCK LIFE: WORLD CHAMPION
The sequel to the duck training phenomenon. Travel the globe racing your duck to become the world champion. This time, your duck can also do something that no duck has ever done before: climb up walls!

DUCK LIFE: EVOLUTION
A breakthrough in duck racing technology has happened! Now you can start your adventure with a genetically modified duck! These ducks can evolve to become naturally better at certain skills


This revamped app version features higher quality graphics, a smoother frame rate and new touch controls! It also includes a brand new challenge mode where your training mini game skills will be truly tested!


KEY FEATURES:
- The original Duck Life games in full HD and 60fps!
- Challenge mode to test your Duck Life mini game skills!
- Over 45 races
